com.smartnsoft.droid4me.framework

Class SmartAdapters.BasisBusinessViewHolder<BusinessObjectClass,ActivityClass extends android.app.Activity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smartnsoft.droid4me.framework.SmartAdapters.BasisBusinessViewHolder<BusinessObjectClass,ActivityClass>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SmartAdapters.BusinessViewHolder
    Enclosing class:
    SmartAdapters

    public static class SmartAdapters.BasisBusinessViewHolder<BusinessObjectClass,ActivityClass extends android.app.Activity>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class wraps the SmartAdapters.BusinessViewWrapper when not used inside a list.
    Since:
    2014.05.23

      android.view.View setView(ActivityClass activity, android.view.View view)
      Sets the view of the of the underlying business view wrapper, so that it is not necessary to invoke the #getView(ActivityClass) method.

    • Method Detail

      • getView

        public final android.view.View getView()
        Is allowed to be invoked once the #getView(ActivityClass) or #setView(ActivityClass, View) method has been called.
        Returns:
        the view which represents the underlying business object

      • getBusinessViewWrapper

        public final SmartAdapters.BasisBusinessViewWrapper<BusinessObjectClass,ActivityClass> getBusinessViewWrapper()
        Returns:
        the wrapper passed in the constructor

      • getView

        public final android.view.View getView(android.view.ViewGroup parent,
                        ActivityClass activity)
        This method should be called only once during the object life cycle.

        This will invoke the DetailsProvider.BusinessViewWrapper#getNewView(ViewGroup, ActivityClass method.

        Parameters:
        activity - the activity on which the business object is being rendered
        Returns:
        the initialized view that represent the underlying business object

      • setView

        public final android.view.View setView(ActivityClass activity,
                        android.view.View view)
        Sets the view of the of the underlying business view wrapper, so that it is not necessary to invoke the #getView(ActivityClass) method.
        Parameters:
        activity - the activity on which the business object is being rendered
        view - the view that will be attached to the business view wrapper
        Returns:

      • updateView

        public final void updateView(ActivityClass activity)
        Synchronizes the rendering of the inner View with the state of the business object.

        This will invoke the SmartAdapters.BusinessViewWrapper#updateView(ActivityClass, View, int) method with a position set to 0.

        Parameters:
        activity - the activity on which the business object is being rendered
